SEARCH
Package org.group7.model.board

Class Base

java.lang.Object
org.group7.model.board.Base
public class Base extends Object
The Base class represents a base in the game. It is used to store pieces of a certain color. The base can hold a specified number of pieces. The base can also remove and add pieces.

  • Constructor Details

    • Base

      public Base(int capacity, Color color, IMoveHandler handler)
      The constructor of the Base class.
      Parameters:
      capacity - The parameter "capacity" is of type "int" and represents the number of pieces that the base can hold.
      color - The parameter "color" is of type "Color" and represents the color of the base.
      handler - The parameter "handler" is of type "IMoveHandler" and is used to handle the movement of the pieces in the game.

  • Method Details

    • initPieces

      private void initPieces(IMoveHandler handler)
      The function initializes a specified number of pieces of the base's color.
      Parameters:
      handler - The "handler" parameter is an instance of the IMoveHandler interface. It is used to handle the movement of the pieces in the game.

    • removePiece

      public Piece removePiece()
      The removePiece() function removes a piece from the base and returns it.
      Returns:
      The method returns an object of type "Piece" (the removed piece) or null.

    • addPiece

      public void addPiece(Piece p)
      The addPiece function adds a Piece object to the base if there is still capacity.
      Parameters:
      p - The parameter "p" is of type "Piece", which represents a piece that we want to add to the base.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      The function checks if the pieceAmount variable is equal to 0.
      Returns:
      The method returns a boolean value, which indicates whether the pieceAmount is equal to 0 or not.

    • getPieces

      public Piece[] getPieces()
      Returns an array of Piece objects in the base.

      An array of Piece objects.
